text: @WhiteHouse Game finished. Unfair Comments R d reasons behind this Situation & International reputation ofUSA. Not proactive action & planning to Control of COVID19 & internal & International matters, So 200% failed d President & no any Hope for next term. Our Bharat & @narendramodi is Hero.
